mapper.select: select k.akb020 as akb020, k.akb020 || '' || d.mdtrtsn as aaz217, k.akb020 || '' || d.mdtrtsn as aaz308, d.FEEDETL_ID as aaz213, NULL as ape835, d.det_rea as ape801, d.cnt as ape805, d.vola_det_amt as ape802, d.aaz319 as aaz319, d.admdvs as aaa027, k.akb020 as aab034, d.rule_type as ape800, d.akc308 as aze001, d.vola_cont as aae317 FROM doc_suspt_detl_final d inner join kb01 k on d.medins_id = k.bkf498 where d.FEEDETL_ID is not null
